a.title: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

tr.td: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

short.value: Patient summary model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

short.value: Document header elements

definition.value: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information

short.value: Document ID

definition.value: Unique identifier of the document
Resource authoring details
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Date and time of authoring/issuing

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the resource

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

short.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

definition.value: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

short.value: Document type

definition.value: Identifies the type of document at hand, e.g. Hospital discharge report.

short.value: Document title

definition.value: Document title, such as Hospital Discharge Report, Laboratory Result Report, etc.

short.value: Document status

definition.value: The status of the Hospital discharge report. E.g., preliminary, final.
Time of service that is being documented
Document attestation details
Attester who validated the document. Mulitple attesters could be provided.
Date and time of the approval of the document by Attester.

short.value: Legal authentication

definition.value: Document legal authentication

short.value: Legal authenticator

definition.value: The person taking responsibility for the medical content of the document
Date and time when the document was authorized.

short.value: Event type

definition.value: Categorization of the event covered by the document (e.g. laboratory study types, imaging study types including modality, etc.). Selection of such tags or labels depends on the use case and agreement betwen data sharing parties. This meta-data element serves primarily for searching and filtering purpuses.
Additional details about where the content was created (e.g. clinical specialty)

short.value: Document custodian

definition.value: Organisation that is in charge of maintaining the document/report.

short.value: Document format

definition.value: An identifier of the document constraints, encoding, structure, and template that the document conforms to beyond the base format indicated in the mimeType.
Level of confidentiality of the document. Implicit value is normal.

short.value: Related documents and information sources

definition.value: Related documents and information sources

short.value: Section: Allergies and intolerances

requirements.value: The element is present in eHN PS GL, MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The element name is taken from MyHealth@EU specification and is the same in ISO IPS and FHIR IPS IG. The name in eHN PS GL for this element is merely 'Allergy', and that was considered less inclusive compared to the alternative.

short.value: Generated text summary of the content in section, for human interpretation

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in section, for human interpretation

requirements.value: The element is present in FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element.

short.value: List of structured allergies and intolerances

definition.value: List of structured allergies and intolerances

requirements.value: The element is present in eHN PS GL, MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The element name is taken from MyHealth@EU specification and is the same in ISO IPS and FHIR IPS IG. The name in eHN PS GL for this element is merely 'Allergy', and that was considered less inclusive compared to the alternative.

short.value: Use if no Allergies are listed

definition.value: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)

requirements.value: This element is present in MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The proposed way of modelling is identical to the newest version of FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element. MH@EU has a similar concept, but it is modelled in slightly different way.

short.value: Medical problems.

definition.value: Conditions that are important to be known for a health professional during a health encounter.

short.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

short.value: Use if no conditions are listed

definition.value: Use if no conditions are listed

short.value: !!Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.!!

definition.value: !!Health conditions affecting the health of the patient.!!

short.value: Section: Medication Summary.

definition.value: Current and relevant past medicine.

short.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in the section, for human interpretation

short.value: Use if no medicines are listed

definition.value: Use if no medicines are listed

short.value: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.

definition.value: Medication treatment/prescription relevant for this patient summary. Typically, medications whose period of time indicated for the treatment has not yet expired whether it has been dispensed or not.

short.value: Section: Medical devices and implants

definition.value: Section: Medical devices and implants

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: Describes the patient's implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.

definition.value: Describes the patient's implanted and external medical devices and equipment that their health status depends on. Includes devices (such as cardiac pacemakers, implantable defibrillator, prothesis, ferromagnetic bone implants etc.) that are important to know by the HP.

short.value: Section: Procedures

definition.value: Section: Procedures

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Reason for absence of data

definition.value: Reason for absence of data

short.value: List of procedures Textual description of the procedure. Describes the type of the procedure, surgical or non-surgical .

definition.value: List of procedures Textual description of the procedure. Describes the type of the procedure, surgical or non-surgical .

short.value: Section: Vaccination/prophylaxis.

definition.value: A patient's immunization status. The section should include current immunization status and may contain the entire immunization history that is relevant to the period of time being summarized. Adverse reactions against vaccines should be documented in the allergy section.

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.

definition.value: Immunizations given to the patient and their status at the point of care.

short.value: Section: Medical History.

definition.value: This section may provide both synthetic anamnesis (e.g. description of phases of the pathology as a chronological summary of clustered clinical information) and anecdotal evidence that clinicians can collect from the patient, and can read in a narrative form.

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)

definition.value: Problems or diagnoses that the patient suffered in the past, and which have been resolved, closed or declared as inactive (not included in current problems or diagnosis)

short.value: Section: Alerts.

definition.value: Information about substantial alerts or warnings that health professionals should be aware of.

short.value: Section: Functional status

definition.value: Section: Functional status

short.value: Section: Social history.

definition.value: Observations on social factors such as alcohol consumption or smoking. From the healthcare perspective, life-style factors relate to well-being but can also provide a source of risk factors.

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Textual description of the social history.

definition.value: Textual description of the social history.

short.value: Section: Pregnancy history

definition.value: Section: Pregnancy history

short.value: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

definition.value: captures relevant information about the patient's recent travel history that may be of clinical relevance — particularly in relation to exposure to infectious diseases, epidemiological risks, or environmental factors. The intent is to support clinical decision-making and risk assessment, especially in contexts such as outbreaks or endemic disease regions.

short.value: Section: Advance Directives.

definition.value: Provision for healthcare decisions if, in the future, a person is unable to make those decisions.

short.value: Section: Observation results.

definition.value: Relevant observation results obtained on the patient. These may be measurements, laboratory results, anatomic pathology results, radiology results or other imaging or clinical results.

short.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

definition.value: Narrative, potentially formatted, content of the section

short.value: Section: Care plans.

definition.value: Therapeutic recommendations that do not include pharmacologic treatments, such as diet, physical exercise, planned surgeries

short.value: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

definition.value: Narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that this Section could be provided in a structured and coded format.

short.value: Patient summary model

definition.value: EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary

short.value: Section: Allergies and intolerances

requirements.value: The element is present in eHN PS GL, MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The element name is taken from MyHealth@EU specification and is the same in ISO IPS and FHIR IPS IG. The name in eHN PS GL for this element is merely 'Allergy', and that was considered less inclusive compared to the alternative.

short.value: Generated text summary of the content in section, for human interpretation

definition.value: Generated text summary of the content in section, for human interpretation

requirements.value: The element is present in FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element.

short.value: List of structured allergies and intolerances

definition.value: List of structured allergies and intolerances

requirements.value: The element is present in eHN PS GL, MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The element name is taken from MyHealth@EU specification and is the same in ISO IPS and FHIR IPS IG. The name in eHN PS GL for this element is merely 'Allergy', and that was considered less inclusive compared to the alternative.

short.value: Use if no Allergies are listed

definition.value: Reason for absence of data (indicates whether the person is known to have no allergies or the data is considered incomplete)

requirements.value: This element is present in MyHealth@EU specifications and ISO IPS. The proposed way of modelling is identical to the newest version of FHIR IPS IG. See general description of Patient summary modelling for more information about this element. MH@EU has a similar concept, but it is modelled in slightly different way.
